content.question: Dr. Feliz is interested in investigating the effectiveness of a new drug for the treatment of anxiety disorders. Ethical guidelines require that prior to starting the study he needs to do which of the following?

choices.label: Set up an exam room for participants
Write a paper proving the effect of the drug
Debrief participants on the purpose of the study

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
